page.title: 19SCHOOLDAYS 1985 (Cont.)
page.content: Primary schools are not really affected except that the teachers are not doing any outside school activities. We sometimes go on trips to theatres or historical places. When we're in the fourth year we go on a four_day trip and stay at a hostel. We do work on the trip when we come back and write diaries of what we have done each day. The last afternoon of each term we are allowed to bring our own games to play. In the last week of the summer term we have a Summer Fair. Everyone helps. We run our own stalls, which are usually small games. The money we get from the stalls goes towards the school funds. We have a school sports day every year with 4 teams out of each class competing against each other. We have our own school swimming pool which is quite small but we all enjoy using it.
